metadata.title: Beautiful Scars
description: Merry Clayton is a living legend of unparalleled solar-powered vocal majesty, boldly bringing the Black American church experience across musical genres and styles. Throughout an astounding career - as a lead and background singer with the greatest artists of all-time - Merry Clayton steps into the spotlight with the gospel project, Beautiful Scars.
